headline: Pod Digital Media Celebrates Seven Years of Connecting Brands Authentically to Growth Audiences
summary: NEW YORK, July 10, 2025--Pod Digital Media (PDM), the cultural hub for growth audiences, podcasts, influencers, live events and activations, announced today its seventh anniversary. For seven years, PDM has been at the forefront of connecting blue-chip advertisers with the consumer segments that command nearly five-trillion-dollar in buying power.

headline: Canadian Red Cross and Walmart Canada launch annual giving campaign
summary: Funds raised support disaster relief in communities across the countryOTTAWA, Ontario, July 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Canadian Red Cross, in collaboration with Walmart Canada, is pleased to announce its annual giving campaign in support of emergency response. For the month of July, Walmart customers across Canada will be invited to support the Red Cross by making a donation during checkout in stores and on Walmart.ca. headline: Hartford Bakery, Inc. Issues Allergy Alert on Undeclared Hazelnuts in "Lewis Bake Shop Artisan Style 1/2 Loaf"
summary: EVANSVILLE, Ind., July 10, 2025--Hartford Bakery, Inc. is voluntarily recalling six lots of its "Lewis Bake Shop Artisan Style 1/2 Loaf" as this product may contain undeclared hazelnuts. People with a nut allergy or severe sensitivity to hazelnuts run the risk of serious or life-threatening allergic reactions if they consume these products.

headline: Calbee America Shrimp Chips Launch New Packaging & Flavors
summary: For 60 years, Calbee Shrimp Chips have excited taste buds in Asian markets thanks to the evocative and authentic Japanese experience that comes with every perfectly crunchy bite. Today, the timeless heritage brand is getting a modern, yet authentic packaging refresh designed to better align with its global counterparts and standout on shelves. Bright, bold colors and a red shrimp graphic front and center carry across the full savory lineup, which includes new zesty Chili Lime and umami-packed Ro

headline: Crave Hot Dogs & BBQ Launches Inside Louisville Walmart: Southern Flavor Meets Shopping Convenience
summary: Crave Hot Dogs & BBQ is bringing a new wave of flavor to Kentucky shoppers with the opening of its express unit inside the Walmart Supercenter at 7101 Cedar Springs Blvd, Louisville, KY 40291. This launch marks a significant milestone in Crave's national expansion and its mission to make the fast-casual BBQ and specialty hot dog chain a household name.

headline: Back-to-school spending set to dip as economic woes shrink budgets, Deloitte forecasts
summary: Overall spending is projected to remain flat at $30.9 billion or $570 per student on average, despite higher prices across all product categories, which is 7% below 2021, according to the report.  Last year, parents spent an average of $586 per child.  The Deloitte survey was conducted online using an independent research panel between May 21 and May 30, involving 1,203 parents with at least one child in grades K-12.

headline: Sen. Warren wants Trump’s FTC to see if companies are using tariffs as cover for price gouging
